title: Refractive index of materials as light ray passes

content.question: A light ray passes through substances 1, 2, and 3, as shown above. The indices of refraction for these three substances are n1, n2, and n3, respectively. Ray segments in 1 and in 3 are parallel. From the directions of the ray, one can conclude that

choices.label: n3 must be the same as n1
n2 must be less than n1
n2 must be less than n3
all three indices must be the same

content.answer: n3 must be the same as n1

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
